rows.label: bf04050100_0010
rows.name: What's this?

rows.label: bf04050100_0020
rows.name: Take it and go to Acedia.

rows.label: bf04050100_0030
rows.name:
That dagger's owner will
tell you how you can get to Eden.

rows.label: bf04050100_0040
rows.name:
This is...a Blade weapon, right?
Who's its owner?

rows.label: bf04050100_0050
rows.name: The man who was once my Driver.

rows.label: bf04050100_0060
rows.name: Your...Driver? Huh? But then...

rows.label: bf04050100_0070
rows.name: Cole is a Blade.

rows.label: bf04050100_0080
rows.name:
We fought together in the Holy Grail War.
Yes... His real name is Minoth.

rows.label: bf04050100_0090
rows.name:
Blades not get old though.
Why Cole look so old?

rows.label: bf04050100_0100
rows.name:
Because I'm one of the cursed ones.
A Flesh Eater.

rows.label: bf04050100_0110
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]!

rows.label: bf04050100_0120
rows.name: A...Flesh Eater?

rows.label: bf04050100_0130
rows.name:
A Blade who has been
fused with human cells.

rows.label: bf04050100_0140
rows.name:
A long time ago, before the war, some sought
to test the limits of Blades' potential.

rows.label: bf04050100_0150
rows.name:
I am a product of their experiments.
One of the unlucky ones who was tainted by their folly.

rows.label: bf04050100_0160
rows.name: Why would ancient people do that?

rows.label: bf04050100_0170
rows.name:
It seems that by combining
Blade and human...

rows.label: bf04050100_0180
rows.name:
It is sometimes possible to create Blades
with extremely unique powers.

rows.label: bf04050100_0190
rows.name:
But only very rarely. Most experiments
were failures, and I was no different.

rows.label: bf04050100_0200
rows.name:
I gained nothing at all, and lost my immortality to boot.
I likely won't last much longer.

rows.label: bf04050100_0210
rows.name: Grandpa...

rows.label: bf04050100_0220
rows.name:
Before I go, I want to see where your
path ends. That dagger will aid you.

rows.label: bf04050100_0230
rows.name: Will you do this for me?

rows.label: bf04050100_0240
rows.name:
Of course! Oh, but can I ask
you to do something too?

rows.label: bf04050100_0250
rows.name: Namely?

rows.label: bf04050100_0260
rows.name:
I was wondering if you could
write a play about Vandham.

rows.label: bf04050100_0270
rows.name: About Vandham?

rows.label: bf04050100_0280
rows.name: Yeah. And I want the troupe to act it out.

rows.label: bf04050100_0290
rows.name:
Once I find Eden, I'll come see you
again. Show it to me then?

rows.label: bf04050100_0300
rows.name:
An interesting notion...
Perhaps that is the least I can do.

rows.label: bf04050100_0310
rows.name:
Very well, I'll do it. So see you make it
back here in one piece, understand?

rows.label: bf04050100_0320
rows.name: Absolutely. You have my word!
